description: Beer and bourbon lovers rejoice! This midnight cocktail is the perfect drink for you. It combines lime juice, blackberries with a splash of Guinness Draught beer to create an unforgettable flavor experience.
name: Guinness Black Magic

recipeInstructions.name: Combine blackberries, sugar syrup, and lime juice in a cocktail shaker. Muddle the blackberry mixture until blackberries are crushed and juicy.

recipeInstructions.name: Add ice and shake vigorously to combine juices with other ingredients.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into a glass filled with fresh ice cubes or cracked iced. Stir in Guinness and garnish with a lime wedge.
